name: BigYellowSticky
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Big ideas written on little yellow pieces of paper. The behind-the-scenes "director's commentary track" for the content posted at https://BigYellowSticky.com -- inspirational and motivation daily posts written in Sharpie on 3x3-inch yellow Post-it notes.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
